titleStmt.title: A discourse of ciuill life containing the ethike part of morall philosophie. Fit for the instructing of a gentleman in the course of a vertuous life. By Lod: Br.
titleStmt.author: Bryskett, Lodowick.
Giraldi, Giambattista Cinzio, 1504-1573. Ecatommiti. VIII.5.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Field] for Edvvard Blount,

notesStmt.note: Based on "Tre dialoghi della vita civille" by Giambattista Cinzio Giraldi, first published as part 2 of his "De gli hecatommithi".
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
